TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WinHttpHandler extends System.Net.Http.HttpMessageHandler

summary.span: 是基于 Windows 的 WinHTTP 接口的专业消息处理程序，适用于服务器环境。

span.span: is a specialty message handler based on the WinHTTP interface of Windows and is intended for use in server environments.

summary.span: 还可将此类作为 NuGet 包安装，以便在桌面应用中使用。

span.span: This class is also available for use in Desktop apps by installing it as a NuGet package.

summary.span: 有关安装此类以便在桌面应用中使用的详细信息，请参阅 [System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=620067)。

span.span: For more information about installing this class for use in Desktop apps, see [System.Net.Http.WinHttpHandler](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=620067).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是类似于其他现有的类，如。 is similar to other existing classes such as . 提供下的一个处理程序实例并用于向服务器发出 HTTP 请求和接收服务器响应。 provides a handler underneath an instance and is used to send HTTP requests out to a server and receive server responses. 旨在由 ASP.NET 核心和其他与 HTTP 服务器通信的.NET 应用程序主要在服务器环境中使用。 is designed to be used primarily in server environments by ASP.NET Core and other .NET applications that communicate with HTTP servers. 此外为开发人员提供更精细地控制应用程序的 HTTP 通信比类。 also provides developers with more granular control over the application's HTTP communication than the class. 这允许开发人员实现更高级的 HTTP 方案或修改系统默认值 （例如，代理设置、 超时和服务器 SSL 证书验证）。This allows developers to implement more advanced HTTP scenarios or modify system defaults (for example, proxy settings, timeouts and server SSL certificate validation). 并非旨在成为替代，它是文档提供以下方案的更高级的版本其中不足以开发人员。 is not intended to be a replacement for , it is a more advanced version provided for scenarios where is insufficient for developers. 作为 Windows 的 WinHTTP 接口上的瘦包装器实现，并在 Windows 系统上才支持。 is implemented as a thin wrapper on the WinHTTP interface of Windows and is only supported on Windows systems. 当使用多个处理程序的链应链底部。When using a chain of multiple handlers, should be at the bottom of the chain.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::DecompressionMethods AutomaticDecompression { System::Net::DecompressionMethods get(); void set(System::Net::DecompressionMethods value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置处理程序用于自动解压缩 HTTP 内容响应的解压缩方法类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of decompression method used by the handler for automatic decompression of the HTTP content response.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 GZip | Deflate。The default value for this property is GZip | Deflate.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AutomaticRedirection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否应跟随 HTTP 重定向响应。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler should follow HTTP redirection responses.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 true。The default value for this property is true. 在此配置中，从服务器的所有 HTTP 重定向响应将都遵循自动除如果它们通过 HTTPS 终结点到 HTTP 终结点重定向。In this configuration, all HTTP redirect responses from the server will be followed automatically except if they are redirecting from an HTTPS endpoint to an HTTP endpoint.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CheckCertificateRevocationList { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在 SSL 证书验证过程中检查证书吊销列表。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to check the revocation list of certificates during SSL certificate validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 false。The default value for this property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Http::ClientCertificateOption ClientCertificateOption { System::Net::Http::ClientCertificateOption get(); void set(System::Net::Http::ClientCertificateOption value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否从证书存储自动挑选证书，或者是否允许调用方通过特定的客户端证书。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates if the certificate is automatically picked from the certificate store or if the caller is allowed to pass in a specific client certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 。The default value for this property is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientCertificates As X509Certificate2Collection

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端身份验证 SSL 证书的集合，在 属性设置为 Manual 时，处理程序将该集合用于客户端身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of client authentication SSL certificates that are used for client authentication by the Handler if the property is set to Manual.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为空集合。The default value for this property is an empty collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::CookieContainer ^ CookieContainer { System::Net::CookieContainer ^ get(); void set(System::Net::CookieContainer ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置托管 cookie 容器对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the managed cookie container object.

summary.span: 仅当 属性设置为 UseSpecifiedCookieContainer 时才使用此属性。

span.span: This property is only used when the property is set to UseSpecifiedCookieContainer.

summary.span: 否则， 方法会引发异常。

span.span: Otherwise, the method will throw an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 `null`。The default value for this property is `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Http::CookieUsePolicy CookieUsePolicy { System::Net::Http::CookieUsePolicy get(); void set(System::Net::Http::CookieUsePolicy value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示应如何管理和使用 cookie。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how cookies should be managed and used.

summary.span: 开发者可以选择忽略 cookie、允许处理程序自动管理 cookie 或使用 对象手动处理 cookie。

span.span: Developers can choose to ignore cookies, allow the handler to automatically manage them or manually handle them using a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 。The default for this property is . 如果此值设置为，必须初始化容器对象，并将其分配给属性。If this value is set to , then a container object must be initialized and assigned to the property. 否则，尝试发送请求时，将引发异常。Otherwise, an exception will be thrown when trying to send a request.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::ICredentials ^ DefaultProxyCredentials { System::Net::ICredentials ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentials ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于向身份验证代理证实用户身份的凭据。

span.span: Gets or sets the credentials used to authenticate the user to an authenticating proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 。The default value for this property is .

summary.span: 释放由调用程序使用的非托管资源和托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources and disposes of the managed resources used by the invoker.

public: property int MaxAutomaticRedirections { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置允许的最大 HTTP 重定向数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of allowed HTTP redirects.

value.span: 将重定向的最大允许的 HTTP 数。

span.span: The maximum number of allowed HTTP redirects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 50。The default value for this property is 50. 如果此值仅适用于设置为`true`。This value only applies if is set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConnectionsPerServer { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置允许向单个服务器连接的最大 TCP 连接数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of TCP connections allowed to a single server.

value.span: 最大允许到一台服务器的 TCP 连接数。

span.span: The maximum number of TCP connections allowed to a single server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值是整数。MaxValue。The default value for this property is int.MaxValue.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxResponseDrainSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置可从响应中排出的最大数据量（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum amount of data that can be drained from responses in bytes.

value.span: 最大可清空从响应以字节为单位的数据量。

span.span: The maximum amount of data that can be drained from responses in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 65536。The default value for this property is 65536.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxResponseHeadersLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置服务器响应中标头部分的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size of the header portion from the server response in bytes.

value.span: 从以字节为单位的服务器响应的标头部分的最大大小。

span.span: The maximum size of the header portion from the server response in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可防止客户端尝试通过发送的响应标头数据的无限期地安装客户端的未经授权服务器。This property protects the client from an unauthorized server attempting to stall the client by sending a response with an infinite amount of header data. 此属性的默认值为 65536。The default value for this property is 65536.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool PreAuthenticate { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示处理程序是否随请求发送授权标头。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the handler sends an Authorization header with the request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 false。The default value for this property is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan ReceiveDataTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置从服务器接收响应的数据部分的超时值。

span.span: Gets or sets the timeout for receiving the data portion of a response from the server.

value.span: 用于从服务器接收的数据部分的响应超时。

span.span: The timeout for receiving the data portion of a response from the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 30 秒。The default value for this property is 30 seconds.

value.span: 用于从服务器接收响应的标头超时。

span.span: The timeout for receiving the headers of a response from the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 30 秒。The default value for this property is 30 seconds.

The timeout for sending a request.

MemberSignature.Value: .property instance class System.Func`5<class System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2, class System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Chain, valuetype System.Net.Security.SslPolicyErrors, bool> ServerCertificateValidationCallback
Public Property ServerCertificateValidationCallback As Func(Of HttpRequestMessage, X509Certificate2, X509Chain, SslPolicyErrors, Boolean)

public: property Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ ServerCertificateValidationCallback { Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ get(); void set(Func<System::Net::Http::HttpRequestMessage ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Certificate2 ^, System::Security::Cryptography::X509Certificates::X509Chain ^, System::Net::Security::SslPolicyErrors, bool> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用于验证服务器证书的回调方法。

span.span: Gets or sets a callback method to validate the server certificate.

summary.span: 此回叫是 SSL 握手的一部分。

span.span: This callback is part of the SSL handshake.

value.span: 如果服务器证书被认为有效，并且应将该申请发送，回调应返回 true。

span.span: The callback should return true if the server certificate is considered valid and the request should be sent.
Otherwise, return false.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为 null。The default value is null. 如果此属性为 null，将使用标准的已知证书颁发机构进行验证服务器证书。If this property is null, the server certificate will be validated using standard well-known certificate authorities.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::ICredentials ^ ServerCredentials { System::Net::ICredentials ^ get(); void set(System::Net::ICredentials ^ value); };

value.span: 要使用客户端向服务器进行身份验证的凭据。

span.span: The credentials to be used by the client to authenticate to the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 null。The default value for this property is null.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols SslProtocols { System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols get(); void set(System::Security::Authentication::SslProtocols value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端支持的 TLS/SSL 协议的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection of TLS/SSL protocols supported by the client.

value.span: TLS/SSL 协议的客户端支持的集合。

span.span: The collection of TLS/SSL protocols supported by the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值是 SslProtocols.Tls | SslProtocols.Tls11 | SslProtocols.Tls12。The default value is SslProtocols.Tls | SslProtocols.Tls11 | SslProtocols.Tls12.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Net::Http::WindowsProxyUsePolicy WindowsProxyUsePolicy { System::Net::Http::WindowsProxyUsePolicy get(); void set(System::Net::Http::WindowsProxyUsePolicy value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置代理设置。

span.span: Gets or sets the proxy setting.

summary.span: 此属性可设置为禁用代理、使用自定义代理或在计算机上使用 WinHTTP 或 WinInet 的代理设置。

span.span: This property can be set to disable the proxy, use a custom proxy, or use the proxy settings of WinHTTP or WinInet on the machine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的默认值为 WinHTTP 堆栈代理服务器设置。The default value of this property is the WinHTTP stack proxy settings.
